welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mexicaltzingo, where charm and history come together in one beautiful city. Get ready to explore and experience the rich culture and delicious cuisine that our city is known for. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Licenciado Adolfo Lopez Mateos International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Licenciado Adolfo Lopez Mateos International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at General Mariano Matamoros Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at General Mariano Matamoros Airport, handling freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
